## AssociationDefinition.targetName property

The target class of the association.

For a source-target association, this is the target. For a parent-child association, this is the child.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly targetName: QNameWithTypeTag<QNameTypeTag.CLASS>;
```
